channel.title: I think I portforwarded.... now what..?
channel.description: Okay, I think I port forwarded correctly but now what? How do I turn my server on so other people can play on it? Do I use utorrent?

item.title: I think I portforwarded.... now what..?
item.dc:creator: @needhoster needhoster
item.description:
@needhoster wrote:

[quote=“Doom32dd, post:5, topic:243073”]if you can port forward using your router, you dont need utorrent[/quote]okay.

Read full topic
item.source: I think I portforwarded.... now what..?

item.title: I think I portforwarded.... now what..?
item.dc:creator: @needhoster needhoster
item.description:
@needhoster wrote:

[quote=“Eddie12390, post:2, topic:243073”]If you portforwared, open up No-Ip duc and then run runserver.bat

Don’t open uTorrent though as it will use the port your hosting on[/quote]well i port forwarded and made the port 43595 and my utorrent port 43595.

Read full topic
